程序包 hangman.game

类 HangmanGameLogic

java.lang.Object
hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
public class HangmanGameLogic extends Object
Represents the logic behind the Hangman game, handling the game state including guesses, score, and win/loss conditions.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    String
    getCurrentState()
    Returns the current state of the secret word, showing guessed letters and hiding unguessed letters with underscores.
    Set<Character>
    getGuessedLetters()
    Retrieves the set of characters that have been guessed by the player.
    static HangmanGameLogic
    getInstance()
    Provides access to the singleton instance of the game logic.
    int
    getScore()
    Retrieves the player's current score.
    String
    getSecretWord()
    Gets the secret word that players are trying to guess.
    int
    getWrongGuesses()
    Gets the number of incorrect guesses made by the player.
    boolean
    isGameLost()
    Checks if the game has been lost.
    boolean
    isGameWon()
    Checks if the game has been won.
    void
    makeGuess(char input)
    Processes a player's guess, updating the game state accordingly.
    void
    resetGame()
    Resets the game to its initial state with a new secret word and clears all guesses and scores.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getInstance

      public static HangmanGameLogic getInstance()
      Provides access to the singleton instance of the game logic. If the instance does not exist, it creates one; otherwise, it returns the existing instance.
      返回:
      The singleton instance of HangmanGameLogic.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets the game to its initial state with a new secret word and clears all guesses and scores.

    • getCurrentState

      public String getCurrentState()
      Returns the current state of the secret word, showing guessed letters and hiding unguessed letters with underscores.
      返回:
      A string representing the current visible state of the secret word.

    • makeGuess

      public void makeGuess(char input) throws NonAlphabeticInputException
      Processes a player's guess, updating the game state accordingly.
      参数:
      input - The character guessed by the player.
      抛出:
      NonAlphabeticInputException - if the input is not an alphabetic character.

    • isGameWon

      public boolean isGameWon()
      Checks if the game has been won.
      返回:
      true if all letters in the secret word have been guessed, false otherwise.

    • isGameLost

      public boolean isGameLost()
      Checks if the game has been lost.
      返回:
      true if the number of wrong guesses exceeds the maximum allowed, false otherwise.

    • getSecretWord

      public String getSecretWord()
      Gets the secret word that players are trying to guess.
      返回:
      The secret word for the current game.

    • getGuessedLetters

      public Set<Character> getGuessedLetters()
      Retrieves the set of characters that have been guessed by the player. This includes both correct and incorrect guesses.
      返回:
      A set of guessed letters.

    • getWrongGuesses

      public int getWrongGuesses()
      Gets the number of incorrect guesses made by the player. This value is used to determine if the game is lost.
      返回:
      The count of wrong guesses.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Retrieves the player's current score. The score decreases with each incorrect guess and can be used to track the player's performance throughout the game.
      返回:
      The current score of the player.
